ygData.subject: Re: Rumor of the bards ultimate weapon?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: James Schuldes  To:  Sent: Tuesday, November 02, 1999 6:50 AM Subject: RE: [eqbards] Rumor of the bards
ygData.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, November 02, 1999 6:50 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Rumor of the bards ultimate weapon?


> From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
>
> Around 7pm central time - I poked my head into the Kith zone and was
greeted
> by a zone fight with some reds with new names. Most everyone was fleeing
to
> the zone and when it was just me and 2 mobs left I stepped back into
safety
> of west c.
>
> Then med, healed who ever needed some and we popped back in - but it was
now
> "day time" such as it is in Kith. People did their CR and kinda explored
> but nothing was found. I ran to RV for some banking and when I popped
back
> in for the next night fall (9pm spawn game-time rumor) but alas - nothing
> happened. So I joined my reg group and headed for Lguk. Saw a system
> message saying something about the event being over (although the
reference
> was to a different zone.)
>
> So - that's all I know.
>
> Sylly
>
>

It's not over in Qeynos Hills, all sorts of new undead.
Skeletal spearmen, level 6-7, they always have a rusty
spear and buckler (worth 4+ gp for the pair).
Skeletal Corporals, Level 7-8, with a rusty battle axe.
Skeletal Soldiers, level <5 (green to my Lvl 8 bard),
various rusty.

I got clobbered by a skeletal monk, and had a Warbones
spawn on my head. All in all, Paw is still better for the
next 3 bubbles. In the course of 5 bubbles of exp around
the outside, and in the first 2 rooms, I've picked up 12 pp
worth of rusty/cloth/wooden shields. Plus it's usually
deserted (only bards seem to have the ability to exploit
that area at that level.)

Padraic, bard of the 8th song.
